creator: Kundalini Lounge Limited
descriptionHtml:
BE INSPIRED. ENERGISED. REJUVENATED.
Transform yourself with the largest online library of Kundalini Yoga classes on your schedule, wherever you are. Get unlimited access to thousands of classes, programs, workshops and lectures from the world’s most renowned Kundalini Yoga teachers and gurus, with new classes added weekly.

Kundalini Yoga can profoundly help you to:
• Improve your mental health and wellbeing
• Build strength and resilience – physically, mentally, and emotionally
• Boost your energy levels and vitality
• Increase your focus and creativity
• Create a grounded state of inner peace and calm
• Reach your true potential

WHY KUNDALINI YOGA
Kundalini Yoga is the yoga of awareness, a quantum science that is the fastest way to establish an alignment between mind, body and soul. It incorporates all styles of yoga, giving you the greatest transformative power. With proper concentration and mindset, you can transform yourself in 40-90 days, something which could take several years with other types of yoga. It’s the highest yoga, one that is intended to suit everyday life and does not require us to withdraw from the world.

PRACTICE WITH THE BEST
We have carefully hand-picked our teachers so that you can practice with world renowned master teachers and gurus who will inspire you on your journey to transform.

PRACTICE IN YOUR OWN TIME:
We have created Kundalini Lounge for yoga meditations, breathing exercises, kriyas and full classes to suit your schedule. From 2 min to 2 hours, we will meet you wherever you are at and support your growth. The benefits are tremendous, even within a very short time.

PRACTICE ANYWHERE
Practice at home, work, or when travelling with your favourite practices at your fingertips - available on phone, tablet, web, TV and offline.

CHOOSE FROM THOUSANDS OF PRACTICES
Our classes, programs, meditations and workshops are ranging from 2 min to 2 hours. Start your journey with classes suitable for any level. Mix it up with new classes released every week. Advance your practice with programs to improve different areas of your life. Use our advanced filtering system to sort by category, instructor, focus, difficulty and length.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE
This app allows you to customise your experience by focusing on specific areas of development of your life. Whether you are looking to de-stress, increase flexibility, build stamina or improve your overall wellbeing, there is a class or programs for you. It is your journey, you choose the pace of your practice. It is also suitable for beginners wishing to learn the basic techniques before joining a regular class.

FREE 14-DAY TRIAL WITH YOUR MEMBERSHIP
Join now and enjoy our library of classes for free for the next 14 days, after which payment will be charged to your account at confirmation of purchase and your subscription will automatically renew you cancel or auto-renew function is turned off at least 24h before the of the current period.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY
You will not be alone in this. Stay motivated, share your experiences and connect with thousands of yogis globally in our online community.

Questions, comments or feedback- we would love to hear from you. Please send us an email at info@kundalinilounge.com, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

We hope you enjoy this journey. May you come to peace with yourself, connect with infinite wisdom, and live in blissful happiness and true radiance.

title:

creator: Kundalini Lounge Limited
descriptionHtml:
BE INSPIRED. ENERGISED. REJUVENATED.
Transform yourself with the largest online library of Kundalini Yoga classes on your schedule, wherever you are. Get unlimited access to thousands of classes, programs, workshops and lectures from the world’s most renowned Kundalini Yoga teachers and gurus, with new classes added weekly.

Kundalini Yoga can profoundly help you to:
• Improve your mental health and wellbeing
• Build strength and resilience – physically, mentally, and emotionally
• Boost your energy levels and vitality
• Increase your focus and creativity
• Create a grounded state of inner peace and calm
• Reach your true potential

WHY KUNDALINI YOGA
Kundalini Yoga is the yoga of awareness, a quantum science that is the fastest way to establish an alignment between mind, body and soul. It incorporates all styles of yoga, giving you the greatest transformative power. With proper concentration and mindset, you can transform yourself in 40-90 days, something which could take several years with other types of yoga. It’s the highest yoga, one that is intended to suit everyday life and does not require us to withdraw from the world.

PRACTICE WITH THE BEST
We have carefully hand-picked our teachers so that you can practice with world renowned master teachers and gurus who will inspire you on your journey to transform.

PRACTICE IN YOUR OWN TIME:
We have created Kundalini Lounge for yoga meditations, breathing exercises, kriyas and full classes to suit your schedule. From 2 min to 2 hours, we will meet you wherever you are at and support your growth. The benefits are tremendous, even within a very short time.

PRACTICE ANYWHERE
Practice at home, work, or when travelling with your favourite practices at your fingertips - available on phone, tablet, web, TV and offline.

CHOOSE FROM THOUSANDS OF PRACTICES
Our classes, programs, meditations and workshops are ranging from 2 min to 2 hours. Start your journey with classes suitable for any level. Mix it up with new classes released every week. Advance your practice with programs to improve different areas of your life. Use our advanced filtering system to sort by category, instructor, focus, difficulty and length.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE
This app allows you to customise your experience by focusing on specific areas of development of your life. Whether you are looking to de-stress, increase flexibility, build stamina or improve your overall wellbeing, there is a class or programs for you. It is your journey, you choose the pace of your practice. It is also suitable for beginners wishing to learn the basic techniques before joining a regular class.

FREE 14-DAY TRIAL WITH YOUR MEMBERSHIP
Join now and enjoy our library of classes for free for the next 14 days, after which payment will be charged to your account at confirmation of purchase and your subscription will automatically renew you cancel or auto-renew function is turned off at least 24h before the of the current period.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY
You will not be alone in this. Stay motivated, share your experiences and connect with thousands of yogis globally in our online community.

Questions, comments or feedback- we would love to hear from you. Please send us an email at info@kundalinilounge.com, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

We hope you enjoy this journey. May you come to peace with yourself, connect with infinite wisdom, and live in blissful happiness and true radiance.
